item.title: Need help fixing rune ess mining place
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

find the object id of the thing you want to give rune ess,
search for case 832:
and make your own case,

case ####: if actionTimer = 0; addItem = ###; sendMessage("You mine the essence!); actionTimer = 15;
replace the ###'s with the IDs,
Post if this doesnt work, or you need more help
note: this is a very generic case and i probably miss spelled something, if you wanted a realistic response you could have added

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ###) if actionTimer = 0; addItem = ###;)
that would make you require a pickaxe if you replaced ### with a pickaxe ID
have fun, i salute you in the feild

Read full topic
